divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were driving on Fwy101 from Santa Monica area towards Ventura. When we were around Calabasas area, I saw a white object in the sky and pointed it to my husband. He was driving and asked me, "Where? I can't see." I said, "It's right there in front of us." The object was not so far from us, and it was recognizable. He kept saying, "I can't see it." I said, "Can't you see that?" I kept pointing it and stared at it. Within 10 seconds, the object went transparent like a magic. I said, "It disappeared!!!" Our car has a window on the ceiling, and my husband opened the plastic slide. I looked up and tried to find the object, but it was gone. After that, we saw 3 or 4 airplanes going by. Then I saw a couple of birds. I could tell wether they were airplanes or birds, but the object I saw had no wings and went transparent. There were no clouds at all. At first, I was looking at an airplane, but there were no wings. I thought the object was moving towards 9 oclock. My husband said, "Maybe you can see different dimentions now because I could not see it." This was the second time I saw UFO. The first time was just 2 weeks ago. May 30th.around 1:30 p.m, I was driving towards my house and I almost got home. There was a bright silver light in the clear blue sky. I looked up and within a second, it disppeared. I parked,got out of my car and looked around, but I could not see anything. I was very excited and told my husband.
Summary: White object disappeared in the blue sky at day time.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Calabasas
There were no other sightings in Calabasas on or around June 12th 2010
